mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE.*, CALENDAR.color AS color, CALENDAR.title AS calendarTitle FROM SCHEDULE JOIN CALENDAR ON SCHEDULE.CALENDARID = CALENDAR.ID JOIN CALENDAR_USER ON CALENDAR.ID = CALENDAR_USER.CALENDARID WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId}

SELECT SCHEDULE.*, CALENDAR.color AS color, CALENDAR.title AS calendarTitle FROM SCHEDULE JOIN CALENDAR ON SCHEDULE.CALENDARID = CALENDAR.ID JOIN CALENDAR_USER ON CALENDAR.ID = CALENDAR_USER.CALENDARID WHERE CALENDAR.id = ${calendarId}

SELECT SCHEDULE.*, CALENDAR.color AS color, CALENDAR.title AS calendarTitle FROM SCHEDULE JOIN CALENDAR ON SCHEDULE.calendarId = CALENDAR.ID JOIN CALENDAR_USER ON CALENDAR.ID = CALENDAR_USER.calendarId WHERE SCHEDULE.id = ${id}

SELECT SCHEDULE.* FROM SCHEDULE JOIN SCHEDULE_USER ON SCHEDULE.ID = SCHEDULE_USER.scheduleId WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId} AND ( TRUNC(startDate) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR TRUNC(endDate) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(id, calendarId, title, content, startDate, endDate) VALUES (SCHEDULE_ID_SEQ.nextval, ${calendarId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
